member.name: T:Korbitec.Compression.ZLib.ZInputStream
member.summary: Performs zlib compression on the input stream

member.summary: The stream that does all the encryption

member.summary: The buffer size to use when deflating/inflating

member.summary: The result of the last flush operation

member.name: F:Korbitec.Compression.ZLib.ZInputStream.buf
member.summary: The buffer used to use when reading a stream

member.name: F:Korbitec.Compression.ZLib.ZInputStream.buf1
member.summary: A buffer that is used to read one byte at a time

member.summary: A boolean value that indicates whether this is class is being used to uncompress or compress

member.summary: Constructor that is used when uncompressing a stream

member.summary: Constructor that is used when compressing a stream

member.name: M:Korbitec.Compression.ZLib.ZInputStream.Read
member.summary: Reads a single byte from the stream
member.returns: The int value of the byte read

member.name: M:Korbitec.Compression.ZLib.ZInputStream.read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads in bytes from the stream
member.param: The offset from the start of the buffer to starting data into
The length of data to read
member.remarks: Depending on how the ZInputStream has been instantiated determines whether reading uncompresses or compresses
member.returns: A value indicating how much was read

member.summary: Moves the position within the stream by the specified amount
member.param: The number of bytes to skip
member.returns: A value indicating the number of byte sthat were skipped

member.name: M:Korbitec.Compression.ZLib.SupportClass.ReadInput(System.IO.Stream,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a number of characters from the current source Stream and writes the data to the target array at the specified index.
member.param: The source Stream to read from.
Contains the array of characteres read from the source Stream.
The starting index of the target array.
The maximum number of characters to read from the source Stream.
member.returns: The number of characters read. The number will be less than or equal to count depending on the data available in the source Stream. Returns -1 if the end of the stream is reached.

member.name: M:Korbitec.Compression.ZLib.SupportClass.ReadInput(System.IO.TextReader,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a number of characters from the current source TextReader and writes the data to the target array at the specified index.
member.param: The source TextReader to read from
Contains the array of characteres read from the source TextReader.
The starting index of the target array.
The maximum number of characters to read from the source TextReader.
member.returns: The number of characters read. The number will be less than or equal to count depending on the data available in the source TextReader. Returns -1 if the end of the stream is reached.
